{{Infobox Network Switch |image1 = Ubiquiti Networks TOUGHSwitch PoE Pro.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Advanced Power over Ethernet Switches |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.ubnt.com/accessories/toughswitch/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Ubiquiti_Networks_TOUGHSwitch_PoE_Pro |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = TS-8 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -PRO |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/22/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Ubiquiti_Networks_TOUGHSwitch_PoE_Pro |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- ethoui -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7242; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53128; |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 8 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (Type A) |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 110-230 |pwr_ac_hz = 50~60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.7 |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13 |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = 192.168.1.20 |defaultlogin = ubnt |defaultpass = ubnt |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = PoE Switch |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/25/2012 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = 799632084389 |ean = 810354022913 |asin = B00CXU1NHY |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== *The TOUGHSwitch delivers reliable passive PoE and Gigabit connectivity :to attached Ubiquiti devices and other devices that support passive PoE. :Models: TS‑16‑CARRIER, TS‑5‑POE, TS‑8‑PRO
*Multiport Gigabit Ethernet Switch: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/ethernet-communication-and-switching/switching/bcm53128 BCM53128]
===Specifications=== Additional specifications, per UBNT's QSG *Management port: 1x 10/100 Ethernet *PoE capabilities: Off/24V/48V over all switched ports :USB ports: 1x USB 2.0 (Type A) *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::210 mm x 185 mm x 41 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::1.24 kg]]
==Links of Interest== [http://dl.ubnt.com/guides/toughswitch/TOUGHSwitch_PoE_8-Port_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.mbreviews.com/best-network-switches/2/#section213 Reviewed on '''MBReviews.com''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://community.ubnt.com/t5/ToughSwitch/TS-Pro-8-Review/td-p/351444 ''Ubiquiti ToughSwitch TS Pro-8'' on '''community.ubnt.com''' forums]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
